description: Professor Messer providing COMPLETELY FREE CompTIA certification training videos covering A+, Network+, and Security+ with comprehensive course materials and study groups.

bash.check_resources:
#!/bin/bash
# Professor Messer Free Resources Check

echo "🎓 Professor Messer FREE CompTIA Training"
echo "=========================================="
echo "Date: $(date)"
echo ""

# Available courses
echo "📚 FREE Complete Courses:"
echo "   • CompTIA A+ (220-1101 & 220-1102)"
echo "   • CompTIA Network+ (N10-008)"
echo "   • CompTIA Security+ (SY0-701)"
echo "   • All videos on YouTube - 100% FREE!"
echo ""

# Course features
echo "✨ Course Features:"
echo "   ✓ Complete video coverage"
echo "   ✓ Follows CompTIA objectives"
echo "   ✓ Mobile downloadable"
echo "   ✓ Closed captions"
echo "   ✓ No registration required"
echo "   ✓ No time limits"
echo ""

# Study groups
echo "👥 Monthly Study Groups (FREE):"
echo "   • A+ - First Saturday"
echo "   • Network+ - Second Saturday"
echo "   • Security+ - Third Saturday"
echo "   • Time: 2 PM ET / 11 AM PT"
echo "   • Platform: YouTube Live"
echo ""

# Links
echo "🔗 Quick Links:"
echo "   Website: https://www.professormesser.com"
echo "   YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/professormesser"
echo "   A+: /free-a-plus-training/"
echo "   N+: /network-plus/"
echo "   S+: /security-plus/"
echo ""

echo "📅 Generated: $(date)"

curl.check_site:
# Check Professor Messer site
curl -s https://www.professormesser.com | grep -o 'CompTIA' | head -5

python.study_planner:
import json
from datetime import datetime, timedelta

class ProfessorMesserStudyPlan:
    """Professor Messer CompTIA Study Planner - COMPLETELY FREE!"""
    
    def __init__(self):
        self.base_url = 'https://www.professormesser.com'
        self.youtube_url = 'https://www.youtube.com/professormesser'
        
        # Course structures
        self.courses = {
            'CompTIA A+ Core 1 (220-1101)': {
                'domains': [
                    ('Mobile Devices', '15%', 8),
                    ('Networking', '20%', 12),
                    ('Hardware', '25%', 15),
                    ('Virtualization and Cloud', '11%', 6),
                    ('Troubleshooting', '29%', 18)
                ],
                'total_videos': 150,
                'avg_length': '10-15 min',
                'study_hours': 40
            },
            'CompTIA A+ Core 2 (220-1102)': {
                'domains': [
                    ('Operating Systems', '31%', 20),
                    ('Security', '25%', 15),
                    ('Software Troubleshooting', '22%', 13),
                    ('Operational Procedures', '22%', 13)
                ],
                'total_videos': 130,
                'avg_length': '10-15 min',
                'study_hours': 35
            },
            'CompTIA Network+ (N10-008)': {
                'domains': [
                    ('Networking Fundamentals', '24%', 15),
                    ('Network Implementations', '19%', 12),
                    ('Network Operations', '16%', 10),
                    ('Network Security', '19%', 12),
                    ('Network Troubleshooting', '22%', 14)
                ],
                'total_videos': 140,
                'avg_length': '12-18 min',
                'study_hours': 45
            },
            'CompTIA Security+ (SY0-701)': {
                'domains': [
                    ('General Security Concepts', '12%', 8),
                    ('Threats, Vulnerabilities, Mitigations', '22%', 15),
                    ('Security Architecture', '18%', 12),
                    ('Security Operations', '28%', 19),
                    ('Security Program Management', '20%', 13)
                ],
                'total_videos': 160,
                'avg_length': '12-20 min',
                'study_hours': 50
            }
        }
    
    def certification_path(self):
        """Recommended certification path"""
        print("🎯 CompTIA Certification Path (ALL FREE VIDEOS!)\n")
        
        path = [
            ('1. CompTIA A+', 'Entry-level IT', '2-3 months', 'IT Fundamentals'),
            ('2. CompTIA Network+', 'Networking professional', '2-3 months', 'A+ recommended'),
            ('3. CompTIA Security+', 'Security professional', '2-3 months', 'Network+ recommended')
        ]
        
        print("📈 Recommended Learning Path:\n")
        for cert, role, duration, prereq in path:
            print(f"{cert}")
            print(f"   Role: {role}")
            print(f"   Study Duration: {duration}")
            print(f"   Prerequisites: {prereq}")
            print()
        
        print("💡 Path Benefits:")
        print("   • Builds foundational knowledge progressively")
        print("   • Each cert reinforces previous learning")
        print("   • Meets DoD 8570/8140 requirements")
        print("   • Vendor-neutral knowledge")
        
        return path
    
    def study_schedule(self, cert_name, hours_per_week=10):
        """Create detailed study schedule"""
        print(f"📅 Study Schedule for {cert_name} ({hours_per_week} hrs/week)\n")
        
        if cert_name in self.courses:
            course = self.courses[cert_name]
            total_hours = course['study_hours']
            weeks_needed = total_hours // hours_per_week
            
            print(f"📊 Course Statistics:")
            print(f"   Total Videos: ~{course['total_videos']}")
            print(f"   Average Length: {course['avg_length']}")
            print(f"   Estimated Hours: {total_hours}")
            print(f"   Your Timeline: {weeks_needed} weeks\n")
            
            print("📚 Study Plan by Domain:\n")
            for domain, weight, hours in course['domains']:
                weeks = hours / hours_per_week
                print(f"   {domain} ({weight}):")
                print(f"      Study Time: {hours} hours")
                print(f"      Timeline: {weeks:.1f} weeks")
            
            print("\n📝 Weekly Schedule:")
            print("   Monday: Watch videos (2 hrs)")
            print("   Tuesday: Review & notes (1.5 hrs)")
            print("   Wednesday: Practice questions (1.5 hrs)")
            print("   Thursday: Watch videos (2 hrs)")
            print("   Friday: Lab practice (1.5 hrs)")
            print("   Saturday: Study group/review (1.5 hrs)")
            print("   Sunday: Rest or catch-up")
            
            return weeks_needed
    
    def free_resources(self):
        """List all free Professor Messer resources"""
        print("🆓 Professor Messer FREE Resources (100% FREE!)\n")
        
        resources = {
            'Video Training': [
                'Complete A+ Core 1 & Core 2 courses',
                'Full Network+ N10-008 course',
                'Complete Security+ SY0-701 course',
                'All videos on YouTube',
                'Downloadable for offline viewing'
            ],
            'Live Content': [
                'Monthly A+ study groups',
                'Monthly Network+ study groups',
                'Monthly Security+ study groups',
                'Live Q&A sessions',
                'Exam updates and tips'
            ],
            'Additional Free': [
                'CompTIA exam objectives',
                'Pop quiz questions',
                'Success stories',
                'Study tips and strategies',
                'Exam registration guidance'
            ],
            'Community': [
                'YouTube comments section',
                'Discord server',
                'Reddit community',
                'Social media updates',
                'Email newsletter'
            ]
        }
        
        for category, items in resources.items():
            print(f"📂 {category}:")
            for item in items:
                print(f"   • {item}")
            print()
        
        return resources
    
    def study_tips(self):
        """Professor Messer study tips"""
        print("💡 Professor Messer Study Tips (FREE!)\n")
        
        tips = [
            '📺 Watch videos in order - they follow CompTIA objectives',
            '📝 Take notes while watching - active learning',
            '🔄 Review videos multiple times for difficult topics',
            '📅 Attend monthly study groups for Q&A',
            '⏰ Set consistent study schedule',
            '📊 Use CompTIA objectives as checklist',
            '🧪 Practice with hands-on labs',
            '📱 Download videos for mobile study',
            '👥 Join the community for support',
            '📈 Track your progress through objectives'
        ]
        
        print("Study Strategy:")
        for tip in tips:
            print(f"   {tip}")
        
        print("\n⚡ Quick Tips:")
        quick_tips = [
            'Videos average 10-15 minutes - perfect for breaks',
            'Use 1.25x or 1.5x speed after first viewing',
            'Focus on exam objectives, not just technology',
            'Supplement with hands-on practice',
            'Review before attending study groups'
        ]
        
        for tip in quick_tips:
            print(f"   • {tip}")
        
        return tips
    
    def monthly_study_groups(self):
        """Information about free monthly study groups"""
        print("👥 FREE Monthly Study Groups (LIVE!)\n")
        
        print("📅 Study Group Schedule:")
        print("   • A+ Study Group: First Saturday of month")
        print("   • Network+ Study Group: Second Saturday")
        print("   • Security+ Study Group: Third Saturday")
        print("   • Time: 2:00 PM ET (11:00 AM PT)")
        print("   • Duration: 2 hours")
        print("   • Platform: YouTube Live (FREE)\n")
        
        print("📋 Study Group Features:")
        features = [
            'Live Q&A with Professor Messer',
            'Exam questions walkthrough',
            'Concept clarifications',
            'Study tips and strategies',
            'Community interaction',
            'Recording available afterward'
        ]
        
        for feature in features:
            print(f"   • {feature}")
        
        print("\n🎯 How to Participate:")
        print("   1. No registration required")
        print("   2. Join YouTube live stream")
        print("   3. Ask questions in chat")
        print("   4. Follow along with materials")
        print("   5. Review recording later")
        
        return True
    
    def generate_study_report(self):
        """Generate comprehensive study report"""
        print(f"🎓 Professor Messer Study Report (100% FREE!)")
        print(f"Report Date: {datetime.now().strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')}\n")
        
        print("=" * 50)
        print("🎯 CERTIFICATION PATH")
        print("=" * 50)
        self.certification_path()
        
        print("=" * 50)
        print("📅 STUDY SCHEDULE EXAMPLE")
        print("=" * 50)
        self.study_schedule('CompTIA Security+ (SY0-701)')
        
        print("\n" + "=" * 50)
        print("🆓 FREE RESOURCES")
        print("=" * 50)
        self.free_resources()
        
        print("=" * 50)
        print("💡 STUDY TIPS")
        print("=" * 50)
        self.study_tips()
        
        print("\n" + "=" * 50)
        print("👥 STUDY GROUPS")
        print("=" * 50)
        self.monthly_study_groups()
        
        print("\n" + "=" * 50)
        print("🔗 QUICK LINKS")
        print("=" * 50)
        
        print("\n🌐 Essential Links:")
        print(f"   • Website: {self.base_url}")
        print(f"   • YouTube: {self.youtube_url}")
        print("   • A+ Videos: /free-a-plus-training/")
        print("   • Network+ Videos: /network-plus/")
        print("   • Security+ Videos: /security-plus/")
        
        print("\n✅ Getting Started Checklist:")
        print("   [ ] Subscribe to YouTube channel")
        print("   [ ] Download first module videos")
        print("   [ ] Get CompTIA exam objectives")
        print("   [ ] Create study schedule")
        print("   [ ] Join Discord/Reddit community")
        print("   [ ] Mark study group dates")
        print("   [ ] Start with first domain")
        
        return True

# Usage
planner = ProfessorMesserStudyPlan()
planner.generate_study_report()

name: Professor Messer Free Training

operational_guidance.value_proposition: Industry-respected educator providing completely free, comprehensive CompTIA certification video training with no registration or payment required
